summary: This is a handmade Playerhome for those wo don\'t want to ruin the Authenticity of Skyrim with large Palaces which have everything for what you normaly have to travel around skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
(I\'m sorry for my bad english :/ )

This is a handmade Cave-Playerhouse for those wo don\'t want to ruin the Authenticy of Skyrim with large Palaces which have everything for what you normaly have to travel around skyrim.

This Playerhome is specialy made for people who want to start over again in Skyrim and with a Playerhouse which is perfect to do that. It doesn\'t has very much and you can\'t do crafting there. This is because it should force you to travel to the next smith or whatever to craft what you want. 
You can only sleep there and store your stuff in the chest. Just look at the pictures !

The Playerhome is a cave near Riverwood, when you cross the bridge. (Look at the pictures)

I really hope you enjoy this. I\'m very new at Skyrim-Modding so please share your ideas with me, positive or negative, doesn\'t matter :)

IF YOU LIKE IT ---> ENDORSE PLEASE !
author: onur53
